content.rendered: This treatment is a common request in our clinic, as we all tend to experience some sagging around the mouth due to the natural process of aging. Unfortunately, for most people, not only does this lead to appearing aged, but sagging around the mouth can cause us to appear unhappy or angry, also. Therefore, the marionette lines, as well as the nasolabial fold HA injectable fillers, serve anyone who wants to rejuvenate their facial expression and create a more youthful look.
